title: SoftBank Group to acquire Swiss firm's robotics division for $5.38 bil
description: SoftBank Group Corp said Wednesday it will acquire the robotics business of Swiss industrial automation company ABB Ltd. for $5.38 billion by 2026 to beef up its robotics business utilizing artificial intelligence technology. SoftBank Group generally focuses its investments on AI-centered industries from the semiconductor, robotics, data centers and energy…
content:
SoftBank Group Corp said Wednesday it will acquire the robotics business of Swiss industrial automation company ABB Ltd. for $5.38 billion by 2026 to beef up its robotics business utilizing artificial intelligence technology.

title: Pope tells journalists to fight back against the ‘art of lying’
description: Leo warns of the dangers of artificial intelligence and the proliferation of ‘junk’ information in a post-truth world
content:

title: Top Democrat demands Medicare insurers disclose uses of AI in care
description: A key Democrat is asking top Medicare Advantage insurers about how they use artificial intelligence in decisions about medical care and coverage.

title: North Korea's Military Is More Advanced Than You Think
description: North Korea’s push to modernize its military is accelerating, fueled by deepening ties with Russia and a focus on artificial intelligence and automated warfare. Pyongyang is now in its strongest strategic position in decades, a reality that demands urgent attention.

title: "For us, AI stands for All Inclusive...India's experience with digital public infrastructure can be extremely useful to the world": PM Modi at Global Fintech Fest
description: Noting that India's approach to Artificial Intelligence (AI) is based on three key principles - equitable access, population-scale skilling, and responsible deployment - Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Thursday that the country has always advocated for a global framework for ethical AI and its experience with digital public infrastructure and learning repositories can be extremely useful to the world.
